name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Selfish of a Rough Stone【#星街すいせい４周年LIVE 】 [RDHf9Tmdvpk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performs "Kisetsu wa Tsugitsugi Shindeiku" by amazarashi during her 4th anniversary live.

subtitles.original: 季節は次々死んでいく
subtitles.english: Seasons Die One After Another

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：秋田 ひろむ
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: Hiromu Akita

subtitles.original: 季節は次々死んでいく
subtitles.english: Seasons die one after another,

subtitles.original: 絶命の声が風になる
subtitles.english: and the voices of death turn into the wind.

subtitles.original: 色めく街の酔えない男
subtitles.english: A man who can't get drunk in the colorful city,

subtitles.original: 月を見上げるのはここじゃ不粋
subtitles.english: looking up at the moon is unrefined here.

subtitles.original: 泥に足もつれる生活に
subtitles.english: In a life where feet get tangled in the mud,

subtitles.original: 雨はアルコールの味がした
subtitles.english: the rain tasted like alcohol.

subtitles.original: アパシーな目で彷徨う街で
subtitles.english: In the city wandering with apathetic eyes,

subtitles.original: 挙動不審のイノセント 駅前で
subtitles.english: suspiciously behaving innocents in front of the station.

subtitles.original: 僕が僕と呼ぶには不確かな
subtitles.english: It's too uncertain for me to call myself "me",

subtitles.original: 半透明な影が生きてる風だ
subtitles.english: it's like a semi-transparent shadow is alive.

subtitles.original: 雨に歌えば雲は割れるか
subtitles.english: If I sing in the rain, will the clouds part?

subtitles.original: 賑やかな夏の干涸びた命だ
subtitles.english: It's a parched life in a boisterous summer.

subtitles.original: 拝啓 忌まわしき過去に告ぐ 絶縁の詩
subtitles.english: Dearly, to my detestable past, a poem of severance.

subtitles.original: 最低な日々の最悪な夢の残骸を 捨てては行けず
subtitles.english: Unable to throw away the wreckage of the worst dreams from my worst days.

subtitles.original: ここで生きてようと 後生花は咲き
subtitles.english: Though I try to live here, flowers after death bloom,

subtitles.original: 君に伝う 変遷の詩
subtitles.english: and a poem of transition reaches you.

subtitles.original: 苦にまみれて 嘆き悲しみ
subtitles.english: Covered in bitterness, grieving and sorrowful,

subtitles.original: それでも 途絶えぬ歌に
subtitles.english: even so, in an unending song,

subtitles.original: 陽は射さずとも
subtitles.english: even if the sun does not shine.

subtitles.original: 明日は次々死んでいく
subtitles.english: Tomorrows die one after another,

subtitles.original: 急いでも追いつけず過去になる
subtitles.english: they become the past even if you hurry to catch up.

subtitles.original: 生き急げ僕ら 灯る火は切な
subtitles.english: Live fast, we are; the lit fire is fleeting,

subtitles.original: 生きる意味などは後からつく
subtitles.english: the meaning of life will come later.

subtitles.original: 君が君でいるには不確かな
subtitles.english: It's too uncertain for you to be "you",

subtitles.original: 不安定な自我が君を嫌おうと
subtitles.english: even if your unstable ego hates you.

subtitles.original: せめて歌えば闇は晴れるか
subtitles.english: If I at least sing, will the darkness clear?

subtitles.original: 根腐れた夢に預けた命だ
subtitles.english: It's a life entrusted to a root-rotted dream.

subtitles.original: 拝啓 忌まわしき過去に告ぐ 絶縁の詩
subtitles.english: Dearly, to my detestable past, a poem of severance.

subtitles.original: 最低な日々の最悪な夢の残骸を 捨てては行けず
subtitles.english: Unable to throw away the wreckage of the worst dreams from my worst days.

subtitles.original: ここで生きてようと 後生花は咲き
subtitles.english: Though I try to live here, flowers after death bloom,

subtitles.original: 君に伝う 変遷の詩
subtitles.english: and a poem of transition reaches you.

subtitles.original: 苦にまみれて 嘆き悲しみ
subtitles.english: Covered in bitterness, grieving and sorrowful,

subtitles.original: それでも 途絶えぬ歌に
subtitles.english: even so, in an unending song,

subtitles.original: 陽は射さずとも
subtitles.english: even if the sun does not shine.

subtitles.original: 疲れた顔に足をひきずって
subtitles.english: Dragging my feet with a tired face,

subtitles.original: 照り返す夕日に顔をしかめて
subtitles.english: grimacing at the reflecting sunset.

subtitles.original: 行こうか戻ろうか悩みはするけど
subtitles.english: I worry whether to go or to go back,

subtitles.original: しばらくすれば歩き出す背中
subtitles.english: but after a while, my back starts walking again.

subtitles.original: そうだ 行かねばならぬ
subtitles.english: That's right, I must go.

subtitles.original: 何はなくとも生きてゆくのだ
subtitles.english: I will keep on living, no matter what.

subtitles.original: 僕らは どうせ拾った命だ
subtitles.english: We are, after all, lives that were picked up,

subtitles.original: ここに置いていくよ なけなしの...
subtitles.english: I'll leave it here, my meager...

subtitles.original: 拝啓 忌まわしき 過去に告ぐ...
subtitles.english: Dearly, to my detestable past...
